title: The Wireless Mouse That NEVER Needs To Be Charged!!
description: Massdrop Vast 35-inch Curved Monitor -   The Razer Mamba HyperFlux features some cool tech that allows for the wireless transfer of power from the mousepad to the mouse. Because of this the Mamba HyperFlux never needs to be charged. So long as it's sitting on the mouse mat it remains functional and will never need to be plugged in directly. I really hope this wireless mouse charging tech ends up in more computer mice. What do you think? Is the Razer Mamba HyperFlux the future of gaming mice or just a gimmick? _________________________________________  WATCH SOME MORE VIDEOS...  The $200 Smartphone You NEED To Know About...
